name: Sole Light: Cool Puzzle Game
summary: Sole Light is an addictive puzzle game with isometric controls and dazzling graphics that will allow you to relax and calm your mind. If you’re a fan of match 3 games, puzzle games, logic games, and relaxing games, Sole Light is the perfect choice. To complete various difficulty levels in this wonderful game, you will have to prove your mettle in intelligence and perceptiveness. You will control a single hero or multiple heroes and progress through subsequent levels by being smart and moving objects encountered on your way. Have fun with our logical puzzle game starting now!
